title: Small Luxury Hotels: No longer an upgrade away from a memorable stay!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Small Luxury Hotels: No longer an upgrade away from a memorable stay! Published on : Saturday, September 5, 2015
There is nothing quite like checking into your favourite hotel and finding out you’ve been upgraded! Small Luxury Hotels of the World™ has decided to do away with chance and is currently offering 20% off suites when you prepay your stay. Junior, Master or Presidential – certainly takes a boutique escape up a notch, perfect for a bustling city break or a snug seasonal getaway. Enjoy afternoon tea on your balcony, a soak in your oversized Victorian bathtub and revel in the sheer bliss of some extra space. Here is a selection of suites on offer by SLH.
St. James’s Hotel and Club
A superbly stylish retreat with an elegant ambiance, St James’s Hotel and Club is only moments from Mayfair, Buckingham Palace and St. James’s Palace. The Westminster Suite, served by a private lift and featuring a large award-winning private rooftop with panoramic views, is one of London’s most impressive. Handmade silk wallpaper, handcrafted Murano glass chandeliers, bath-side television and legendarily comfortable Hypnos mattresses ensure a luxurious experience.
La Peschiera
Puglia is a hot destination for travellers and lovers alike – all the rooms in La Peschiera, which is perched on the shores of the Puglia coast feature Adriatic views and with only 12 rooms privacy is ensured. A really memorable stay will find you in the Master Sea View Suite, with its own private pool and patio. Guest won’t want to leave their own room but as a former fish hatchery the hotel has loads of charm and character and is well worth exploring and sampling the delicious menu at the hotels’ seafront restaurant.
The Iroquois New York
New York, New York. So great, they named it twice. A city where space is coveted and worshipped. The Iroquois, just a stone’s throw from Time Square has a presidential suite fit for a president – with a dining room and kitchenette and scenic views of 44th street – guests have all they need to conquer this incredible city. The hotel’s Triomphe restaurant ensures that their guests are both well cared for and well fed; while the incredible location ensures days full of adventure and exploration.
Twinpalms Phuket
Phuket, Thailand deals in luxury and they also deal in suites. With so many on offer at the Twinpalms Phuket, guests are spoiled by choice. Between Palm and Lagoon Pool one and two bedroom suites as well as a Penthouse, Duplex Pool Suite and Presidential Penthouse all vying for guests attention there isn’t really anywhere to go wrong. Palm Suites are for privacy, while Lagoon Pool Suite ensures delightful tropical surroundings, and for those seeking the ultimate in luxury and indulgence – the Presidential Penthouse 2 Bedrooms is not only good for a group or family but is also a memory maker with a 24 hour Resident Host and concierge service as well as a 16 m private lap pool.
Tiamo Resort
It’s not easy to get to – but the journey is part of the experience. After boarding a float plane and landing on Andros island in the Bahamas guests enjoy the height of eco luxury and the The Full Moon Villa is top of list for many guests. With over 1,200 square feet of space including two bathrooms and beach front access it’s no wonder it’s always full. The Starlight Villa is also a hot ticket item, with its own wet bar and pool, making it perfect for lovers and honeymooners. Scuba diving, snorkelling and kayaking are also popular on the island for those who manage to leave their rooms at last to enjoy this exemplary tropical oasis.
